line.text: ' has been destroyed. Your ships have been undocked.'
'During a crisis you destroyed a station of the '
'You destroyed a company station and have lost reputation with all factions.'

line.comment: * Conquer sector - to the claimer - if it was the last station. $killer.owner is the claimer if there was none before.
* Claim the sector if it's not already done.
* better not do this during a Xenon Crisis because the killer owner is not always the one who should get the sector
* for safety, should actually not happen
* If this is an NPC outpost, we must transfer backlog to the nearest safe Outpost, if any.
